revised_title: Interference of Icterus in Occluded Ductus Choledochus: An Investigation on Bile Circulation
tldr: The author investigates the interference of icterus in occluded ductus choledochus and finds that bile pigment and bile acid can only reach the blood through the intervention of lymphatics. The study also reveals the development of collateral lymphatics in the left thoracic duct, leading to the right innominate vein.
